content: crocheted cotton face cloth 1 ball dk cotton i used sirdar luxury soft cotton hook size uk 8 4 00 mm american g/6 my finished cloth was 7 square n b crochet terms are british main piece make 30ch 1 turn and work along chain starting with 3htr into 3rd chain from hook miss 2ch 3htr into next chain continue in this way to end but work 1htr in last st turn 2 2ch for height does not count as a stitch 3htr into first st *miss 2 sts 3htr into next st repeat from * to end but work 1htr in last st turn repeat row 2 until work is square fold diagonally to check do not cut off the yarn edging round 1 making 2ch at every corner work round all sides in double_crochet working 1dc in each st of top edge and foundation chain and work 28 double_crochet down each side do not turn the work round 2 begin with 2ch for height and work 1htr into every double_crochet work 2htr 2ch 2htr into each corner 2ch space round 3 work 1dc bet first 2 sts *2ch miss next half_double_crochet work 1dc into space between this half_double_crochet and the next repeat from * to end working 1dc 2ch 1dc into each corner space slip_stitch to join cut yarn and sew in the end
